meta.name: dc:Title

frontmatter.doctitle: Pipeline 2 DTBook Test Content: Multi Volume Books

level1.p: The DAISY Pipeline 2 project is under active development and welcomes any kind of contributions. Depending on your skills or intents there are several ways to participate:

level2.p: Feel free to join the ongoing discussions on the developers mailing list (hosted on Google Groups).
Results of the DAISY Pipeline 2 project will be released as open source software, under a business-friendly license such as the GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL).
